name: Chi Ting
description:
For millennia, the monks have wandered the maze-like corridors of monasteries in search of the sacred lantern. They navigate in darkness as a test of faith.

You are Ting, an elder monk from the Tumeni Mountain range, and have been practicing the sacred art of Chi for decades. Through this, you have learned to echo-locate through force of Chi and no longer have to rely on faith.

You are

Chi Ting.
